stateCompliance.headline: California Payday Loan Laws for Oxnard Residents
stateCompliance.content: Oxnard residents in Ventura County are protected by California's strict Deferred Deposit Transaction Law, administered by the California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI). These regulations ensure borrower protection and prevent predatory lending.
keyPoints: Maximum loan: $300 including all fees (typical $255 cash plus $45 fee)
Fee limit: 15% of check amount, maximum $45
One loan per person: Can only have one active payday loan
No rollovers: Cannot extend or refinance loans for fees
Criminal prohibition: Cannot threaten or pursue criminal prosecution
NSF limited: Only one $15 fee per bounced check
Clear disclosure: All fees in dollars and APR
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is for general educational purposes only. Payday loan laws may change. For current information, contact the DFPI at 1-866-275-2677 or dfpi.ca.gov. For specific legal questions, consult a California attorney. Individual lender terms vary within state law limits.

faq.question: Where is your Oxnard location?
faq.answer: We're at 2145 North Oxnard Boulevard, Suite 130, near Oxnard Beach and Oxnard Shores. Take US-101 Exit 57 toward Oxnard Boulevard. Easy parking available.

faq.question: What do I need to apply?
faq.answer: Bring a valid government ID, recent pay stub or bank statements, and your active checking account. Most Oxnard residents are approved within 30 minutes.

faq.question: What's the maximum I can borrow?
faq.answer: California law limits loans to $300 total. You'll typically get $255 cash with a $45 fee. Exact amount depends on your income.

faq.question: How fast is approval in Oxnard?
faq.answer: Most applicants are approved and receive cash within 30 minutes at our North Oxnard Boulevard location. Quick verification process.

faq.question: Are fees transparent?
faq.answer: Yes. California requires all fees disclosed in dollars and APR. No hidden charges or surprise fees.
